#toptips here about managing our relationship with our smart phones & #socialmedia. They can become intrusive 24/7... I particularly like “recalibrate response times expectations” & “keep technology out of the bedroom“ https://t.co/zEuQoWLf0z

Checking in with colleagues is so important 👌🏻🤗💐
It’s good for both of you and ⬆️ teamwork & productivity too. You can’t always tell how someone is feeling; they could be hiding anything behind a plastic smile.

Men often struggle with being open about their #mentalhealth
#GraysonPerry @Alan_Measles talking about this at the @MentalWealthFST this evening “Groups of men putting pressure on each other to be more masculine. Not showing any weakness and being tough” #MWF2018 https://t.co/HDWUu3rjEg

“Don’t give up Hope; there is a lot that life can give you & there is a lot that you can give”
#Hope & #Recovery are so valuable for people with #mentalhealth problems
When we’re suffocating under the thick heavy smog of depression, Hope is the rainbow🌈 🌚➡️🌝 #MWF2018

Thanks @ELFTArts for helping me communicate through #ArtTherapy when I was almost unable to speak due to #depression
Delighted to say I unveiled my “wonderful work of art” 🎨at the @NationalGallery today as part of my #recovery workshop at the @MentalWealthFST #MWF2018 @NHS_ELFT https://t.co/bsEMFp1avQ

@shergillhss Great stuff... it’s so important to have a flexible approach to fit around clinicians. Just turning up and boring people by reading from multiple overly-busy power points for 20 minutes is a killer 😩 Presentations are all about engagement, communication & telling stories ✅✅✅

@RMayNurseDir It’s great to see so many wellbeing at work tweets @RMayNurseDir and a range of different initiatives to help us open up conversations about #mentalhealth 👌🏻 I’m looking forward to seeing you & your team on Friday; I know you practice what you preach 😊💐
Tongue-in-cheek, but it made me smile. A gazillion processes simplified, though a bit more comfort & compassion wouldn’t go amiss #endoflifecare #eolc https://t.co/NM6WGjXdv9
